definitions.definition: To carry off , especially in haste , secrecy , or mystery .
Sometimes followed by up : to animate with vigour ; to excite ; to encourage ; to inspirit .
examples: Civil dissensions often spirit the ambition of private men.

main_definition: To carry off , especially in haste , secrecy , or mystery .
secondary_definitions: Sometimes followed by up : to animate with vigour ; to excite ; to encourage ; to inspirit .
